translations.A guide for foreign residents in Japan: 面向居住在日本的外国人的指南
translations.Get specific garbage collection details: 获取由人工智能提供支持的当前位置的具体垃圾收集详情。
translations.In Japan, garbage is sorted into several: 在日本，垃圾被分为几类。请查看当地城市的指南了解具体信息，以下是常见的垃圾类型：
translations.❌ Plastics with recycling marks: ❌ 带有回收标志的塑料请分开投放
translations.✔ PET bottles, cans, paper (cleaned & se: ✔ PET瓶、易拉罐、纸类（请清洗并分类）
translations.✔ Tie newspapers and cardboard with stri: ✔ 报纸和纸箱请用绳子捆扎
translations.❌ Dirty plastic goes in burnable: ❌ 污染的塑料请投入可燃垃圾
translations.✔ Large items like furniture, bikes: ✔ 家具、自行车等大型物品
translations.➤ Book pickup & pay fee at city office: ➤ 需预约上门回收并在市政府缴费
translations.Check your city's garbage schedule: 请确认当地垃圾收集日程
translations.Use official trash bags from stores: 请使用指定垃圾袋（可在便利店购买）
translations.Use the right disposal spot: 请在指定地点投放垃圾
translations.Dispose garbage at the right time: 请在规定时间内投放垃圾
translations.Address: 1-2-61 Koraku, Bunkyo City, Tok: 地址：日本东京都文京区后乐1-2-61，邮编123-0006
